title: PM Modi in Singapore: Modi calls for global solar action during the first international solar festival
description: PM Modi Singapore visit: Prime Minister Narendra Modi urged global action to make Earth greener during the first International Solar Festival. Speaking in Singapore, he emphasised the importance of transitioning to solar energy and highlighted India's growth in this sector. Modi identified awareness, affordability, and availability as key factors for sustainable solar energy adoption.
